Class ec.e.util.CompoundEnumeration 
All Packages  Class Hierarchy  This Package  Previous  Next  Index

Class ec.e.util.CompoundEnumeration 

java.lang.Object
   |
   +----ec.e.util.CompoundEnumeration
public class CompoundEnumeration
extends Object
implements Enumeration
A utility class that provides an enumeration of a set of enumerations. Arguably this should have been part of the standard Java class library all along.

CompoundEnumeration(Enumeration, Enumeration)
Construct an Enumeration from a pair of them.
CompoundEnumeration(Enumeration, Enumeration, Enumeration)
Construct an Enumeration from three of them.

hasMoreElements()
Test if this Enumeration has more elements.
nextElement()
Get the next element in this Enumeration.

CompoundEnumeration 
  public CompoundEnumeration(Enumeration enum1,
                             Enumeration enum2)
Construct an Enumeration from a pair of them.
Parameters:
enum1 - The first Enumeration
enum2 - The second Enumeration
CompoundEnumeration 
  public CompoundEnumeration(Enumeration enum1,
                             Enumeration enum2,
                             Enumeration enum3)
Construct an Enumeration from three of them.
Parameters:
enum1 - The first Enumeration
enum2 - The second Enumeration
enum3 - The third Enumeration

hasMoreElements 
  public boolean hasMoreElements()
Test if this Enumeration has more elements.
Returns:
true iff we're not done yet.
nextElement 
  public Object nextElement()
Get the next element in this Enumeration.
Returns:
The next element in the Enumeration.
